LanguageData.ocd.description:
Drill deep into the planetary crust and mine {0}.
Yield: {1:n0} {2}
LanguageData.ocd.gameneeded: Per-material settings are available during a running game.
LanguageData.ocd.density.tip: Controls how large deposits of resources are. Affects resource yields. Has no effect on stone chunks. NOTE: Yields are capped to produce at least one unit of a material. If the yield is scaled down further, the yield value will not change - instead the amount of work will increase to compensate.
LanguageData.ocd.drillwork.tip: Controls how much work is needed to drill each resource. Drill work is built of two components: Drilling to - and ultimately drilling into the resources. This modifies the drilling into or 'get the stuff' component.
LanguageData.ocd.commonality.tip: Controls how much work is needed to 'find' each resource. Drill work is built of two components: Drilling to - and ultimately drilling into the resources. This modifies the drilling to or 'find the stuff' component. Has no effect on stone chunks.
LanguageData.ocd.work.tip: Directly modifies the work needed to drill for a material.
LanguageData.ocd.yield.tip: Directly modifies the drilling yield for a material. NOTE: Yields are capped to produce at least one unit of a material. If the yield is scaled down further, the yield value will not change - instead the amount of work will increase to compensate.
